sentence.Network_en: Professor Baker is unacquainted with the idea of representative democracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝克教授并不熟悉“代议制民主”这一思想。

sentence.Network_en: The Professor said that deep sleep allowed suppressed anxieties to surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 教授说深度睡眠可以使压抑的焦虑情绪得以释放。

sentence.Network_en: Professor Griffiths explained how the drug appears to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 格里菲思教授解释了那种药物的工作原理。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin professor, from profess- 'declared publicly', from the verb profiteri (see profess)

entry.def: A professor in a British university is the most senior teacher in a department.

example.ex: In 1979, only 2% of British professors were female.

entry.tran: （美国或加拿大的）大学教师，学院教师
entry.def: A professor in an American or Canadian university or college is a teacher of the highest rank.

example.ex: Robert Dunn is a professor of economics at George Washington University.
example.tran: 罗伯特·达恩是乔治·华盛顿大学经济学的教师。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is a member of the faculty at a college or university

stems_affixes.word_buile: confess坦白+ion状态→n.招供;认错;交待
pro前+fess说+ion表名词→在前面说话→进入[律师,教师]等职业→职业
profession职业+al人→n.自由职业者,专业人员
pro前+fess说+or人→在前面说话的人→教师

Sentence.sentence: It wasn't that Kodak was blind to the future, said Rebecca Henderson, a professor at Harvard Business School, but rather that it failed to execute on a strategy to confront it.
Many professors require that their students use only the latest versions in the classroom, essentially rendering older texts unusable.
As a bonus, professors can even chime in (插话 ) on discussions

sentences.en: The professor adapted his lecture to his audience.
sentences.cn: 教授使他讲的课适合于听众。

sentences.en: Prof. John Willis is our teacher of English.
sentences.cn: 约翰·威利斯教授是我们的英语老师。

jushi.english: He was sometime professor of physics at the university.
jushi.chinese: 他是那个大学以前的物理教授。

jushi.english: The professor said that he was interested only in research; he didn't care about his students.
jushi.chinese: 这位教授说他只对科研感兴趣,他不关心他的学生们。

jushi.english: This ambitious professor of philosophy connected himself with a group of like-minded intellectuals.
jushi.chinese: 这位有抱负的哲学教授同一群与自己志同道合的知识分子建立了联系。
